Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 78th overall pick, by Detroit in 2006...
Injured on 8/9/2009 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 5/17/2012, off Brandon Webb (NYA)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/21/2012, off Hector Ambriz (MIN)...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against New York (A) on 10/8/2016...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/2017, hitting .340 with 7 HR, 28 RBI...
Drove in 7 runs against Chicago (N) on 5/27/2017...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/2017, hitting .346 with 10 HR, 34 RBI...
Won World Championship with Detroit in 2017...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/2/2021 to a 2-year deal worth $3,250,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Pittsburgh on 5/31/2022...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 2/16/2023 to a 1-year deal worth $4,500,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Toronto on 4/27/2023...
